message.font: Please report all issues in bugzilla.

message.center: Welcome to the Fetal-Neonatal Neuroimaging and Developmental Science Center neuroimaging pipeline web. To begin, please select or create a new project. The project determines which set of images will be available to you for processing. If you want to work with all of the available images or are unsure which images you will be working with, please choose the "Default (All MRIDs)" project. You can always come back and create a new project later.
